Name: Corpse Reviver No.2 (Contemporary Recipe)
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Yellow Chartreuse replaces triple sec in this riff on the classic Corpse Reviver Cocktail No. 2 .
History: A riff on the classic Corpse Reviver No. 2, this recipe was popular with London bartenders during the late noughties.
Nutrition: One serving of Corpse Reviver No.2 (Contemporary Recipe) contains 162 calories
